name: find-and-replace
description: Find and replace within buffers and across the project.

focusEditorAfterSearch.description: Focus the editor and select the next match when a file search is executed. If no matches are found, the editor will not be focused.

projectSearchResultsPaneSplitDirection.title: Direction to open results pane
projectSearchResultsPaneSplitDirection.description: Direction to split the active pane when showing project search results. If 'none', the results will be shown in the active pane.

closeFindPanelAfterSearch.title: Close Project Find Panel After Search
closeFindPanelAfterSearch.description: Close the find panel after executing a project-wide search.

scrollToResultOnLiveSearch.title: Scroll To Result On Live-Search (incremental find in buffer)
scrollToResultOnLiveSearch.description: Scroll to and select the closest match while typing in the buffer find box.

liveSearchMinimumCharacters.description: The minimum number of characters which need to be typed into the buffer find box before search starts matching and highlighting matches as you type.

showSearchWrapIcon.title: Show Search Wrap Icon
showSearchWrapIcon.description: Display a visual cue over the editor when looping through search results.

instantSearch.description: Search as you type, instead of waiting until you stop typing.
